response.overview: One morning, two suns appeared in the sky, not one as usual, thus confusing everyday life. Such controversial phenomenon news flood the morning shows, followed by more controversial events as the day goes forward. Meanwhile, Mr. Edris's family faces a social breakdown: a divorce in the light of the husband’s whims and the wife’s intransigence. On the other hand, their son and daughter live in an altered world. On that day a plumber enters their life to be part of a series of events that takes place in both the universe and their middle-class family. Will this be a meltdown of the universe or the family?  Watch now on Serbest Film Distribution | SIFF ➡www.serbestdistribution.com/programs/rockpaperscissors
response.title: Rock, Paper, Scissors
